document.full_text: the obama administration, under criticism for its treatment of the u.s. soldier accused of leaking secret documents that appeared on the wikileaks website, is transferring the detainee to a kansas jail.
document.title: u.s. moves wikileaks soldier manning to kansas jail
lines_and_colors: the obama administration, under criticism for its treatment of the u.s. soldier accused of leaking secret documents that appeared on the wikileaks website, is transferring the detainee to a kansas jail.
